title: Kitsune and Tanuki
caption: Name a more iconic duo.. I'll wait.

title: Kitsune vs Tanuki
caption: Flying-Dragon Tanuki battles with the Nine-Tailed White Fox.

title: Tanuki Shapeshifting
caption: Tanuki may use a leaf when shapeshifting.

title: Bunbuku Chagama
caption: Bunbuku Chagama is a Japanese folktale or fairy tale about a tanuki, that uses its shapeshifting powers to reward its rescuer for his kindness.
